sources.title: The Big Top (1938)
sources.description: Puddy goes to a circus where he watches the various acts, but misinterprets Apaché dancing canines as an assault on the girl. He beats up the boy. Incredibly, everyone cheers this egregious bit of audience participation. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-big-top-1938/

metadata.Plot: Puddy goes to a circus where he watches the various acts, but misinterprets Apaché dancing canines as an assault on the girl. He beats up the boy. Incredibly, everyone cheers this egregious bit of audience participation.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
